documents.document: Oh man… as a Chromehounds fan I know those feels. Brutal. https://t.co/tU5iyDyNZo
@jasonimms went through to the keeper 😞
@jasonimms thanks! She’s a total butts
@DarkestKale she’s such a jerk
@noreasonspec @0mikr0n @FlameRoastToast I opened the fridge to get the hummus, she jumped in.
Look at this bullshit... https://t.co/O9WZXQscKs
@RaygunBrown is that yours?
@DarkestKale yeah. I mean it’s fine for them. I feel for the GG crew that were left behind cos of it though.
@DigitallyDownld I’ve always liked the idea of a show like the panel. Rotating roster of guests and hosts.
@nicktatorship @DigitallyDownld is that not still around?
@gritfish you just made my brain go pop in wonderful ways.
@noreasonspec meme the fuck out of it I reckon. Besides I’m more aiming at the ABC than anyone else.
@Aidie_ dude if only I had the time to put into really getting a production together. The ideas I have…
Boy do I have conflicted feelings about this whole GG thing.
@LevelUpAdrian nothing. Nothing at all. Now here’s Kochie…
@gritfish @Joabyjojo pitch it to Sky News.
@noreasonspec of course.
@noreasonspec swinging hard choc
@TheSaltminer @PressStartAU I have friends on the GG crew and I can’t stop hurting for them, so I can’t imagine how they must feel.
@Jickle this is really great James.
@noreasonspec @PressStartAU mother effin channel 7 of all networks.
@Aerial_Fox @0mikr0n I can’t look past the ABCs reaction to them leaving. Its fucking obscene. Guess is ABC knew, decided couldn’t challenge
@Aerial_Fox @0mikr0n I’d say it’s more complex than that. State of the ABC and their upper management, money, personal reasons.
@VOOK64 and we all know how much ch7 love them video games.
@0mikr0n @Aerial_Fox it’s too early for those sorts of predictions, but I have to wonder if they burned off their good will with the move.
So much for that potential audience. My tv show is dead before it started. 😢
@nicktatorship oh nice! Also I demand you give yourself more credit.
@nicktatorship finalist spot? For what??
Fuck this fucker and fuck the fuckers who let him out. Fucking freak. https://t.co/KZZTWMkiQC
@Jickle I was trying to hold off buying any new games for a while but resisting Yakuza is somewhat difficult.
@VOOK64 u spreading fake news m8?
@CptHollingworth can you believe FFC is on board with endorsing it etc?
Alex Jones has to be the best comedian around. His Info Wars specials are just 😘👌
@Jonny_Roses would love to go but it’s faaaaar too late for me now! Sure it’ll be rad though.
Same thing happened with Alien Isolation. Wanted so badly to play it through. Could only play 15 minutes at a time. Eventually stopped.
I want to play RE7 but my body is terrified of horror and won’t actually let me.
A hahahaha RTX Sydney is this weekend and I had no idea. I’d make a great journo.
@Mario__Bones stop this
What is with the counterintuitive ways politicians do things? https://t.co/nnxjeMbcql
my latest for @HyperMagazine - Props to @CptHollingworth for letting me call out Shane the dickhead #StardewValley https://t.co/l5k2RpomYB
@jasonimms that thing needs so much more than a trip back to Vvardenfell to make it feel worthwhile.
@nicktatorship oh Lordy no
Stardew Valley’s slow start backs up the enjoyment, but when the dam breaks the fun goes from a trickle to a flood. https://t.co/0BYdanms1l
@BrianPShea Brian please no
The latest @giantbomb cast sounds like someone was hitting the phase flip button every now and again.
@Element_105 @nicktatorship they must be punished back to the future style.
For a racing circuit, @circuitamericas has a top level twitter game
Satisfying #PS4share https://t.co/YieuMCKBoi
@DoomGolly it’s a phone alarm so it’d be a little odd if they weren’t around. It’s stopped now at least.
I think the person upstairs might be dead cos frankly only a dead person could allow their alarm to ring for 20 minutes.
Lots of Morrowind stuff hitting at the same time. Sure it’s 2017?
@noreasonspec battlefield 1: two
that rig… https://t.co/QaclXsDhBd
@manfightdragon wowser. And for a game made by musicians as well!
@Aerial_Fox @Mario__Bones ahhh this makes sense.
@Aerial_Fox @Mario__Bones do you get all the escalation missions?
@Aerial_Fox @Mario__Bones wait really? I didn’t even think about that. It came with the digital version I bought.
@dhindes really like the ambient effects in this shot, fog in the background and the single leaf that falls
@austin_walker oh man 😞 I worry when Americans are online at this, the witching hour.
@austin_walker austin how on earth are you still awake
@DigitallyDownld in my bio ☺️
@Mario__Bones that mission is rad
@Mario__Bones is that the bonus one for sapienza?
@DigitallyDownld certainly am
@catbenstead lol. Why must people be weird. Why.
@DigitallyDownld I would totally be down for that.
There are actually quite a few twitterer people who I think would be super interesting to chat about games with every week.
@catbenstead right up there with blasting music from a phone.
@noreasonspec @0mikr0n hahah. No room for cynics on YT
So who wants to start a tv show? #subtweet
Oh. Good. I’m getting into the right industry then. https://t.co/ogRqdf9pa4
@DaveMilbo all of the above
@jiggsy who the hell still pays in cheques? Also my phone doesn’t recognize the word cheque, demonstrating its total irrelevance.
Hope you’re doing alright @eliotfish
icymi - some quick words on #GoodGame's pointless cancellation https://t.co/mvG7SeR1nv
If you aren’t reading Waypoint, you should. They are killing it with some great stuff lately. https://t.co/ancIQjHRS4
The theme from kingdom for keflings is stuck in my head.
@MaizeWallin oh wow, that was a much larger miss rate than I was expecting.
@MaizeWallin out of interest how often do you receive briefs without references?
@MaizeWallin yay another audio person! 😀
Wing Commander eh
“Like, follow and subscribe”
“Please justify my existence”
I am so impatient when I have pieces waiting to be published.
People are putting their controllers out for Good Game.
@dippizuka this is what makes the least sense to me.
Wish I could have taken a little more time pulling this together but writing from work means I have to be quick.
Some quick thoughts on the ABC's cancellation of Good Game https://t.co/mvG7SeR1nv
@nicktatorship people are celebrating this?
@sgt_rawk @noreasonspec spawn point is continuing, but no, the whole thing is gone.
@JLaG013 that place has become a shade of what it was. For what it’s worth dude, I’m sorry again.
@JLaG013 what a fucking joke.
@JLaG013 I’m a little in shock. Won’t prompt you publicly but I cannot understand why two hosts leaving kills a show in its tracks.
@Hewso81 yeah neither. Not ideal for mainstream games coverage.
@noreasonspec what a piss poor excuse though. Hosts are a dime a dozen.
@JLaG013 hey man, does today’s news affect you?
Good Game has been cancelled. Why? Wasnt it hugely popular?
@CptHollingworth 👌this 👌 tweet 👌 is 👌 sweet 👌
@McGarnical same. Hard to imagine they wouldn’t get a knock on their office door the moment that account got out.
But I wouldn’t know the first person to speak to about doing something like that.
